snippet.title: Launch Trailer | UNO® Valhalla DLC
snippet.description:
Play your favourite card game like a Viking in UNO® Valhalla DLC!

In this new UNO DLC inspired by the mythical world of Assassin’s Creed® Valhalla, follow Eivor’s path to glory. 

For the first time in UNO, the board is part of the gameplay: explore, collect resources, battle against other players and play all your cards to be worthy of Valhalla.

To learn more about UNO: http://www.ubisoft.com/r/uno-acv/youtube

Buy now: http://www.ubisoft.com/r/uno-acv/youtube#5nuCvFtPz7wbB53c1Gkjpo
